snippet: The European telecommunications operator has agreed to sell back more than one billion shares to China Unicom, as the European financial crisis continues to hurt earnings in Telefónica's main markets.
abstract: The European telecommunications operator has agreed to sell back more than one billion shares to China Unicom, as the European financial crisis continues to hurt earnings in Telefónica's main markets.

headline.main: Telefonica to Sell Shares Back to China Unicom for $1.4 Billion
